name: mcp-obsidian
description: MCP Server for Obsidian Vault Access via Local REST API
author: Oleksandr Kucherenko <oleksandr.kucherenko@artfulbits.se>

scripts.docker:run: docker run --name mcp-obsidian --env DEBUG --env API_KEY --env API_HOST --rm -i mcp/obsidian:latest
scripts.docker:cleanup: docker image prune --all && docker volume prune --all
scripts.mcp:inspector:docker: bunx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector -e DEBUG=mcp:\* -e API_KEY=$API_KEY -e API_HOST=https://$WSL_GATEWAY_IP docker run --name mcp-obsidian --env DEBUG --env API_KEY --env API_HOST --rm -a STDOUT -i mcp/obsidian:latest
scripts.mcp:inspector:local: bunx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector -e DEBUG=mcp:\* -e API_KEY=$API_KEY -e API_HOST=https://$WSL_GATEWAY_IP bun run src/index.ts
scripts.publish:prepare: bun run build && bun pm pack
